description:
exp/html: correctly handle <title> after </head>

The <title> element was getting removed from the stack of open elements,
when its parent, the <head> element should have been removed instead.

Pass 2 additional tests.

exp/html: correctly handle <title> after </head>

The <title> element was getting removed from the stack of open elements,
when its parent, the <head> element should have been removed instead.
